note:
Inveterate computer toucher: SRE, occasional programmer, Bit Wrangler and General Nerd. Husband of one + Father of three living in Adelaide. Occasional swearing. He/him.

Love board games; reading sci-fi, fantasy, and historical books; cycling; Survivor (all of them); NFL, Premier League, F1. Fascinated by WW1.

“Give a person software, and infuriate them for a day. Teach a person to create their own software, and infuriate them for the rest of their life.”
